title: How to Grill Bacon Wrapped Asparagus

steps.headline: Combine the seasonings.
steps.description: Pour about 1/2 cup of olive oil into a bowl. Add about 1/4 of a cup of flax seed oil. Put in a little amount of all of the seasonings, but not too little. Stir the mixture.

steps.headline: Prepare the other ingredients.
steps.description: Chop the ends off the asparagus. Get out platter and lay bacon flat on it.

steps.headline: Wrap the asparagus.
steps.description: Make bundles of about 4-6 pieces wrapped in bacon. Put two toothpicks through each bundle so they won't come undone.

steps.headline: Season the bundles.
steps.description: Paint lightly with the mixture of olive oil and seasonings. Sprinkle on some lemon pepper.

steps.headline: Turn grill onto medium.
steps.description: Let it heat until it's at 400 °F (204 °C).

steps.headline: Put the bacon-wrapped asparagus on the grill.
Keep a close eye on it while it cooks.
steps.description: Flip after 5-7 minutes. Paint lightly with the olive oil mixture. Flip again after 6 minutes, and again if needed. Keep the bundles on the grill until the bacon is cooked and crispy and the asparagus is tender.

text: Combine the seasonings. Pour about 1/2 cup of olive oil into a bowl. Add about 1/4 of a cup of flax seed oil. Put in a little amount of all of the seasonings, but not too little. Stir the mixture. Prepare the other ingredients. Chop the ends off the asparagus. Get out platter and lay bacon flat on it. Wrap the asparagus. Make bundles of about 4-6 pieces wrapped in bacon. Put two toothpicks through each bundle so they won't come undone. Season the bundles. Paint lightly with the mixture of olive oil and seasonings. Sprinkle on some lemon pepper. Turn grill onto medium. Let it heat until it's at 400 °F (204 °C). Put the bacon-wrapped asparagus on the grill.  Keep a close eye on it while it cooks. Flip after 5-7 minutes. Paint lightly with the olive oil mixture. Flip again after 6 minutes, and again if needed. Keep the bundles on the grill until the bacon is cooked and crispy and the asparagus is tender. Enjoy!
